data.name: Kingdom: New Lands - Skull Island
data.detailed_description: Kingdom New Lands now brings a 6th island to explore and develop. This will present the greatest challenge never-before-seen in Kingdom, and will put your every skill to the test. Can you survive the nights and be the ruler that your people need?
data.about_the_game: Kingdom New Lands now brings a 6th island to explore and develop. This will present the greatest challenge never-before-seen in Kingdom, and will put your every skill to the test. Can you survive the nights and be the ruler that your people need?
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Danish, Japanese, Norwegian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Finnish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX Snow Leopard (version 10.6)
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 320m
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks (version 10.9)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS or similar
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
